top_comments.comment: So this morning I said I love this... it is now 3:48 pm and have gotten everything I need to complete this project, thank you so much for the inspiration!!!!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Yoduvh…I have a challenge for you…do you have a solution for open face tv stands….the ones where the tv mounts at the top portion (looking like it floats) and the base has glass shelving and open. I’m sick and tired of looking at the electronic stuff and want to hide it
That is so beautiful!! Question how would you decorate a tile bathroom wall?
You’re truly amazing , so creative in every piece you put together 👏👏 thank you for sharing your talent with us may god bless you
Love this! Now this project seem alot more easier to do for me to do, but I love all of your projects! Your hands are truly gifted.
Another great adaptation. You're the best.  :-)
Love watching your channel. You’re so creative!
O.M.G  You out did yourself..🙌that's what I call talent Ms.Lady I got to try this project thank-you for this one..keep it coming😄
This is so awesome! I'm definitely gonna try this!
